c74object.name: gyro.speakerDecoder~
c74object.description: Decodes a soundfield to binaural. Use argument to select ambisonic order. Ambisonic order 1 by default.

method.name: set
method.digest: Set a speaker's location using (azimuth, elevation) in degrees
method.description: Set a speaker's location using (azimuth, elevation) in degrees

attribute.name: Spkr 4 angles
attribute.digest: Set a speaker's direction using (azimuth, elevation) in degrees
attribute.description: Set a speaker's direction using (azimuth, elevation) in degrees.

attribute.name: Spkr 3 angles
attribute.digest: Set a speaker's direction using (azimuth, elevation) in degrees
attribute.description: Set a speaker's direction using (azimuth, elevation) in degrees.

attribute.name: Spkr 2 angles
attribute.digest: Set a speaker's direction using (azimuth, elevation) in degrees
attribute.description: Set a speaker's direction using (azimuth, elevation) in degrees.

attribute.name: Spkr 1 angles
attribute.digest: Set a speaker's direction using (azimuth, elevation) in degrees
attribute.description: Set a speaker's direction using (azimuth, elevation) in degrees.
